DOC.brief_title: Dysphagia Following Anterior Cervical Spine Surgery ; Steroid v Saline
DOC.detailed_description: This investigation prospective , randomize , double-blind , control trial test peri-operative steroid versus saline effect swallow anterior cervical spine surgery . Swallowing symptom measure use patient report Bazaz scale Dysphagia Short Questionnaire . Swallowing data obtain pre-operatively , one day two day post-operatively one week , two week , four week , three month , six month , one year post-operatively . Other data collect analysis include patient comorbidities , level type surgery , intra-operative fluid , estimate blood loss , type retractor , type brace , length stay , surgically related complication . Patient clinical outcome capture use web-based progress report . Patients complete QoL-12 , Neck Disability Index , Visual Analog Scale questionnaires electronically pre-operatively one year post-operatively . This outcome data help u analyze swallow function symptom overall clinical course patient enrol study .
